instructions: Tap the app for the kind of purchase you're checking, either iTunes Store or App Store. In the App Store, tap your profile icon in the upper right, then Purchased . Next, tap My Purchases . If you have Family Sharing set up , tap on the individual family member whose purchases you want to check. You can tap Not on This iPhone at the top of the app. This displays purchases not currently installed on your device. In the iTunes Store app, tap the More tab at the bottom, then Purchased . Tap Music , Movies , or TV Shows to see the item you purchased. If you have Family Sharing, you can tap the individuals in your family group below.
